name: Applicants are slowing
description: New job applications are down 34% over the last two weeks, compared to the number of job reqs available.

name: Floor temperature is low
description: Floor 3 and 4 temperatures are averaging 2.6 degrees cooler than other floors.

name: Longer time between product releases
description: Product release times are averaging 2.1 weeks longer than at this time in 2020.

name: Absenteeism in Marketing
description: Marketing department staff are on premises 42% of the time they were at this time last year.
